events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue described by the customer matches refund-related problems based on the request.
Assigning this refund case to agent John for further handling and customer communication.
Hello! Iâ€™m John from customer support. I understand you want to request a refund for your order.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Here is my order number 123456789 and I have attached a photo showing that I received a different product.
Thank you for the info. We will initiate a full refund immediately and you can keep the incorrect item if you wish.
Thanks for the quick response and solution. I appreciate the option to keep the item.
The refund has now been processed and should appear in your account within 3-5 business days.
We are following up to ensure you received your refund and that everything is resolved to your satisfaction.
As we have not received any further concerns, your refund case is now officially closed. Thank you for your patience.
